basics.label: ASSISTANT SECRETARY/PARKS & REC DIRECTOR
basics.summary: Flexible accounting professional who adapts seamlessly to constantly evolving accounting processes and technologies.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Assist the Secretary with daily accounting duties. Prepare Deposits. Answer Phones and process mail. Interact with the public and Township employees. Posting of supervisor meeting minutes. Updating of ordinances and resolutions. Create a master plan for the parks & rec department. Monitor the parks for maintenance issues. Maintain the township's social media accounts.
highlights: Initiated the use of a computerized accounting system
Increased office organization by developing a more efficient filing system
Updated excel charts and worksheets to be more efficient

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Assist the Treasurer with daily accounting duties

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for A/R, A/P, Payroll and Bank Reconciliations
highlights: Responsible for Collection of Accounts Receivable
